actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) 2-phosphono-butane-1,2,4-tricarboxylic acid and sodium salts; (2) p-aminoazo-benzene-3,4-disulfonic acid, monosodium salt and disodium salt; (3) n-butylisocyanate (NBI); and (4) cyclohexyliso-cyanate (CHI).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on certain chemicals.
